ENTER_USERNAME_TO_START: Enter a username to get started!
WELCOME_BACK: Sign in to continue where you left off, or create an account to get started!
HOW_TO_CARD_DESC_1: This will be your central hub to view your saved places, points collected, and other stats. It is also where you can search for a new location.
HOW_TO_CARD_DESC_2: After searching for a location, you will be taken to the map screen, each place you visit you will gain you points.
HOW_TO_CARD_DESC_3: Tap a destination on the map or the list to select it, you can choose from here to view more information or receive directions.
HOW_TO_CARD_DESC_4: Selecting 'Info' will open a new screen where you can view opening hours, reviews and contact information where available.
HOW_TO_CARD_DESC_5: Selecting 'Navigate' will start a route to your destination as well as informing you of the time to get there.
HOW_TO_CARD_DESC_6: When you're within 100 meters of the location whilst navigating, or selecting the location on the map, you'll gain the points!
UNSAVING_WARNING: Unsaving means you will lose all current progress for this location
NO_RESULTS_DESC: No points of interest found for your entered place.
NO_DIRECTIONS_DESC: We couldn't find a route from your current location.
NO_PERMISSION_DESC: Please enable location permissions to receive directions.
OFFLINE_WARNING_TITLE:
You are currently offline.
Some functionality will be limited.
NO_INFO_DESC: Sorry, we couldn't get the information for this place.
LOGIN_FAILED_DESC: We were not able to sign you in using these details, please ensure you have entered them correctly and try again.
SIGN_UP_FAILED_DESC: We were not able to sign you up at this time.
INVALID_USERNAME_DESC: Your username must not be longer than 20 characters.
LOGIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters.
LOGIN_PASSWORD_UPPER_LOWER: Password must have a mixture of uppercase and lowercase letters.
LOGIN_PASSWORD_NUMBERS: Password must contain at least one number.
